system.description: You summon a swarm of wasps, locusts, or similar creatures that attack all other creatures within the area. The swarm deals 1d6 points of piercing damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) to any creature that begins its turn in the area. A Fortitude save halves this damage. The swarm is so thick that the area is treated as heavily obscured; creatures inside take a -4 penalty to Dexterity and cannot make attacks of opportunity. The swarm persists for 1 round per caster level.

components.materialDescription: A few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a drop of fat.

system.target: One swarm of insects per three levels, each in a 10-ft. cube
